about_the_game:
Illegal plantation is a first-person game where you can grow marijuana, distribute it with your car, and unlock new strains of marijuana to grow over time. Watch your empire expand as you partner with your competitors, drive some out, or even eliminate all of them and become the monopoly in your region.

But that’s not all, in the open world, you will find many more activities. You can go to casino and lose all your money. Find other ways to earn money, go on adventures, and watch your business soar.


Start with one plant and give it some love. Water it, put it in good lighting, and let it enjoy some air flow and be sure to protect it from pests.
When you first start out, you will have to work hard to maintain your quality. In time, watch your plantation expand as you find more and more strains to cultivate for your customers. By the end, you could be the sole owner of the multiple, if not all the weed in your region. The basement will be your first place to grow your plants - arrange your basement from scratch, place lights, pots, fans, air conditioning - just as you like and watch your farm grow to massive proportions.


It is not enough to grow your weed, but you have to ensure that your customers are able to get it conveniently! Distribute your goods to customers yourself. Or, if you find yourself handling dozens and dozens of new customers, hire help and expand your empire. With a monopoly, you will need help to maintain your business!


Your competition is your constant threat. Decide which of your competitors you want to work with, and which ones you want to drive out of business. Or, build up your monopoly and eliminate all your competition. You can choose to play small or go big and become the top player in the industry in your region.

content_descriptors.notes: The game includes breeding and distribution of marijuana

name: Illegal Plantation

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 or AMD equivalent
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or AMD equivalent

short_description: It’s time to leave it all behind and do a dance with the law. Build your own illegal plantation, cultivate your weed, water the plants, maintain good air temperature and good lighting. Deliver your goods or hire local dealers for it. Get rid of the competition and build your own monopoly.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian
